document_data.name: Aventine
document_data.mainbody: '''Aventine''' was a [[deep gnome|svirfneblin]] city located in the [[Underdark]] near [[Dambrath]].
document_data.History:
The deep gnomes inhabiting Aventine, and much of the city, was destroyed by [[drow]] aided by [[crinti]] and [[arkaiun]]. Though the drow and crinti did not suffer many casualties during the attack, the arkaiun, or shebali, were nearly wiped out.

Queen [[Melanith]]'s consort, [[Sadalar]], was killed during the conflict. For their support, the drow awarded the crinti with prime drow males with whom to breed. Melanith selected a new consort from this bunch.
